div.span: Welcome to the Dublin City Schools website!

img.alt: Welcome to the Dublin City Schools website!
img.div:
We are glad that you are interested in us and we would like to tell you a little about our system.
We have restructured our school system to make learning relevant for our students and to strengthen the partnerships between homes and schools.
We have two elementary schools that serve grades Pre-K through 4. Each one has a unique academic theme that is used to get students involved in project based learning. Both schools teach the same Georgia Standards of Excellence, but student projects focus on the school's theme. Susie Dasher Elementary is a Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts and Math (STEAM) school. Hillcrest Elementary is a Leadership, Environmental Awareness, and Public Service (LEAP) school. Parents may choose to put their students in either of these schools. There are no school zones. Both schools offer services for students with special needs, including gifted education.

span.data-emptytext: Dublin City Schools provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value: Dublin City Schools is an "equal opportunity employer." The employer will not discriminate and will take "affirmative action" measures to ensure against discrimination in employment, recruitment, advertisements for employment, compensation, termination, upgrading, promotions, and other conditions of employment against any employee or job applicant on the bases of race, creed, color, national origin, or sex.

p.span: Dublin City Schools is an "equal opportunity employer." The employer will not discriminate and will take "affirmative action" measures to ensure against discrimination in employment, recruitment, advertisements for employment, compensation, termination, upgrading, promotions, and other conditions of employment against any employee or job applicant on the bases of race, creed, color, national origin, or sex.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
